thread.title: IMPRESSIVE...
thread.title_full: IMPRESSIVE... - Review of Lake Victoria Serena Golf Resort & Spa, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Omoniyi_David
title: IMPRESSIVE...
text:
Unfortunately we did NOT get to spend a night here, so I can't really say much about many things, but the hotel looks really impressive. It's a massive facility and we were there for site inspection during the Pearl of Africa Tourism Expo POATE 2017. We also enjoy lunch after looking around and the food was very good. Staff was friendly too.
